animeDescription: A 90 second anime adaptation of the original Tonari no 801-chan manga about a 28 year-old salaryman otaku who has a 22 year-old co-worker girlfriend who is a fujoshi, or female otaku obsessed with yaoi.
animeStaff: [['Yamamoto Yutaka', ['Director']], ['Nakashima Kazuko', ['Color Design']], ['Hirooka Takeshi', ['Director of Photography']], ['Kojima Ajiko', ['Original Creator']]]
